name: Easy Way to Sell Digital Goods with Payhip
author: Jodacame

sections.description:
The WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin is the ultimate tool for selling your digital products on your WordPress site.

With this powerful plugin, you can create a beautiful and professional page for your products, complete with a “Buy Now” button that will take your customers to the Payhip checkout page to complete their purchase. You can also customize the appearance of your product pages to match your brand, add custom content to the sidebar area, and use the Gutenberg editor to write and format your product descriptions.

Plus, you can add a YouTube video to your product page to showcase your products and provide additional information to your customers. And if you want to sell your products on other platforms in addition to Payhip, you can add custom links to redirect customers to those platforms. With WP Payhip Sell Digital, you’ll have everything you need to sell your digital products like a pro.

This plugin requires a Payhip account to use onpage checkout.

Documentation

Visit the plugin documentation at https://jodacame.dev/kb/wp-payhip-integration//

Examples

Here are some examples of product pages created with the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin:

Real example of a product page created with the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin

https://jodacame.dev/store/ai-content-x-pro/

Real example of a product page with custom link created with the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin

https://jodacame.dev/store/ai-content-x-gpt-3-content-generator/

Features

  • Customizable product pages: With the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin, you can customize the appearance of your product pages to match your brand.
  • Add custom content to the widgets area: You can add custom content to the widgets area to provide additional information to your customers.
  • Use the Gutenberg editor to write and format your product descriptions: The WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin is compatible with the Gutenberg editor, which means you can use it to write and format your product descriptions.
  • Add a YouTube video to your product page: You can add a YouTube video to your product page to showcase your products and provide additional information to your customers.
  • Add custom links to redirect customers to other platforms: The WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin allows you to add custom links to redirect customers to other platforms, in addition to Payhip. This way, you can sell your products on multiple platforms using your WordPress site.
  • “Buy Now” button: The WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin includes a “Buy Now” button that will take your customers to the Payhip checkout page to complete their purchase.
  • Shortcode: Display grid of all items using [payhip-lists].
  • Full Color Customizable: You can customize the colors of all elements of the plugin to match your brand.

External Services

In order to use the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin, you’ll need to have a Payhip account and at least one digital product set up on the platform. Without a Payhip account, you won’t be able to use the “Buy Now” button to take customers to the Payhip checkout page to complete their purchase.

However, you can still use the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin to create a product page on your WordPress site and add a custom link to redirect to another market place, even if you don’t have a Payhip account.
sections.faq:
What is the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin?

The WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin is a WordPress plugin that allows you to sell your digital products on your WordPress site using the Payhip platform. With this plugin, you can create a beautiful page for your products, complete with a “Buy Now” button that will take your customers to the Payhip checkout page to complete their purchase.

Do I need a Payhip account to use the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin?

Yes (and Not keep reading), in order to use the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin, you’ll need to have a Payhip account and at least one digital product set up on the platform. Without a Payhip account, you won’t be able to use the “Buy Now” button to take customers to the Payhip checkout page to complete their purchase.

Can I sell my products on other platforms in addition to Payhip with the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin?

Yes, the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin allows you to add custom links to redirect customers to other platforms, in addition to Payhip. This way, you can sell your products on multiple platforms using your WordPress site.

Can I customize the appearance of my product pages with the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin?

Yes, the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin allows you to customize the appearance of your product pages to match your brand. You can also add custom content to the sidebar area and use the Gutenberg editor to write and format your product descriptions.

Is the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin compatible with the Gutenberg editor?

Yes, the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin is compatible with the Gutenberg editor, which means you can use it to write and format your product descriptions.

Can I add a YouTube video to my product page with the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin?

Yes, the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin allows you to add a YouTube video to your product page to showcase your products and provide additional information to your customers.

Is the WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin supported by Payhip?

The WP Payhip Sell Digital plugin is a third-party plugin that is not developed or supported by Payhip. It is designed to work seamlessly with the Payhip platform, but Payhip does not endorse or support this plugin. If you have any issues with the plugin, you will need to contact the pluginâ€™s developers for assistance.

1.0.0

  • Initial release

1.2.2

  • Added featured image compatibility
  • Added new section for demo, example or lite version (Custom Extra Link)

1.2.3

  • Added shortcode for display all items and customization option
